Jx.Selection

Manage selection of objects.

Example

var selection = new Jx.Selection();

Events

selectfired when an item is added to the selection.  This event may be changed by passing the eventToFire option when creating the selection object.
unselectfired when an item is removed from the selection.  This event may be changed by passing the eventToFire option when creating the selection object.

License

Summary
Jx.SelectionManage selection of objects.
Options
eventToFireAllows the developer to change the event that is fired in case one object is using multiple selectionManager instances.
Properties
selectClassthe CSS class name to add to the wrapper element when it is selected
Options
selectMode{string} default single.
selectToggle{Boolean} Default true.
minimumSelection{Integer} Default 0.
Constructor
Jx.Selectioncreate a new instance of Jx.Selection
Functions
defaultSelectselect an item if the selection does not yet contain the minimum number of selected items.
selectselect an item.
unselectremove an item from the selection.
selectedreturns the items in the current selection.
isSelectedtest if an item is in the current selection.

Options

eventToFire

Allows the developer to change the event that is fired in case one object is using multiple selectionManager instances.  The default is to use ‘select’ and ‘unselect’.  To modify the event names, pass different values:

new Jx.Selection({
  eventToFire: {
    select: 'newSelect',
    unselect: 'newUnselect'
  }
});

Properties

selectClass

the CSS class name to add to the wrapper element when it is selected

Options

selectMode

{string} default single.  May be single or multiple.  In single mode only one item may be selected.  Selecting a new item will implicitly unselect the currently selected item.

selectToggle

{Boolean} Default true.  Selection of a selected item will unselect it.

minimumSelection

{Integer} Default 0.  The minimum number of items that must be selected.  If set to a number higher than 0, items added to a list are automatically selected until this minimum is met.  The user may not unselect items if unselecting them will drop the total number of items selected below the minimum.

Constructor

Jx.Selection

create a new instance of Jx.Selection

Parameters

options{Object} options for the new instance

Functions

defaultSelect

defaultSelect: function(item)

select an item if the selection does not yet contain the minimum number of selected items.  Uses Jx.Selection::select to select the item, so the same criteria is applied to the item if it is to be selected.

select

select: function (item)

select an item.

Parameters

item{DOMElement} a DOM element or an element ID.

unselect

unselect: function (item)

remove an item from the selection.  The item must already be in the selection.

Parameters

item{DOMElement} a DOM element or an element ID.

selected

selected: function ()

returns the items in the current selection.

Returns

{Array} an array of DOM elements in the current selection

isSelected

isSelected: function(item)

test if an item is in the current selection.

Parameters

item{DOMElement} a DOM element or an element ID.

Returns

{Boolean} true if the current selection contains the item, false otherwise

defaultSelect: function(item)
select an item if the selection does not yet contain the minimum number of selected items.
select: function (item)
select an item.
unselect: function (item)
remove an item from the selection.
selected: function ()
returns the items in the current selection.
isSelected: function(item)
test if an item is in the current selection.
